description.value:
The native denizens of Axiom, the Plane of Uttermost Law, memonek dwell in a land with lakes and trees and birds and flowers. But on this alien world, the lakes are seas of mercury, the birds glitter with wings of glass stretched gossamer thin, and the flowers’ petals are iridescent metal as flexible and fragile as any earthly rose.

The minds of memonek are highly ordered. Their reason is their great pride. But when descending to the lower planes, including a manifold like Orden where law and chaos mix, a sickness comes over them—an uncontrollable sensation called emotion.

Memonek Traits

Memonek heroes have access to the following traits.

Signature Trait:@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.CtMlN4oLTmq7t9Ff]{Fall Lightly}

Signature Trait:@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.g3Jj190yTU3DuEM0]{Lightweight}

Purchased Memonek Traits

You have 4 ancestry points to spend on the following traits. (Quick Build: Lightning Nimbleness, Nonstop.)

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.mmBpEU7rkbKmoNJy]{I Am Law (1 Point)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.UvjXi5wXwSbtbzY4]{Keeper of Order (2 Points)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.mjJ4CRUPCfpb2Vuo]{Lightning Nimbleness (2 Points)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.zXJteUEoV9C65cMB]{Nonstop (2 Points)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.oOYRsaTZCDp9OY6V]{Systematic Mind (1 Point)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.MgNqH2CQEvtr4G8g]{Unphased (1 Point)}

@UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.origins.Item.p8FB9d7mRSahMwtT]{Useful Emotion (1 Point)}
